channel.title: Port keeps opening and closing
channel.description:
I have followed a port forwarding tutorial from portforward.com and I downloaded the port checker from that site too. I tried the checker and it says "port open" then I tried it again and it says "port NOT OPEN!" I don't know why it just keeps going "open" "not open" "not open" "open" "not open" and so on. I have checked whether I port forwarded properly and I also checked if my port is open in some online sites and they say it's not opened.
Does anyone else have this problem? btw this is not a private server question it's just for regular downloading. I can't figure this out if anyone else have this problem and know how to fix it please tell me how to fix it

item.title: Port keeps opening and closing
item.dc:creator: @Microsoft2 Microsoft®
item.description:
@Microsoft2 wrote:

Are you talking about private servers? Because I’m port forwarding for torrents, but sometimes online sites say my port is open and sometimes they say it’s closed.

Read full topic
